system.effect: Target - A foe within 10 meters\nIf used as a Swift Action, the last Move used by the target becomes Disabled. If used as a Standard Action, the target is Flinched and Paralyzed. If used as an Extended Action that takes about 1 minute, it can erase up to 10 minutes that have occurred within the last 30 minutes from the targetâ€™s memory.
